query:
query ($days: Int!, $mexID: String!) {
  farms {
    ... on FarmModelV2 {
      address
      farmToken {
        assets {
          website
          description
          status
          pngUrl
          svgUrl
          __typename
        }
        decimals
        name
        collection
        ticker
        __typename
      }
      farmTokenPriceUSD
      farmTokenSupply
      farmingToken {
        balance
        decimals
        name
        identifier
        ticker
        owner
        assets {
          website
          description
          status
          pngUrl
          svgUrl
          __typename
        }
        price
        type
        __typename
      }
      farmingTokenPriceUSD
      farmedToken {
        balance
        decimals
        name
        identifier
        ticker
        owner
        assets {
          website
          description
          status
          pngUrl
          svgUrl
          __typename
        }
        price
        type
        __typename
      }
      farmedTokenPriceUSD
      pair {
        address
        firstToken {
          balance
          decimals
          name
          identifier
          ticker
          owner
          assets {
            website
            description
            status
            pngUrl
            svgUrl
            __typename
          }
          price
          type
          __typename
        }
        firstTokenPriceUSD
        secondToken {
          balance
          decimals
          name
          identifier
          ticker
          owner
          assets {
            website
            description
            status
            pngUrl
            svgUrl
            __typename
          }
          price
          type
          __typename
        }
        secondTokenPriceUSD
        liquidityPoolToken {
          balance
          decimals
          name
          identifier
          ticker
          owner
          assets {
            website
            description
            status
            pngUrl
            svgUrl
            __typename
          }
          price
          type
          __typename
        }
        state
        type
        info {
          reserves0
          reserves1
          totalSupply
          __typename
        }
        feesAPR
        totalFeePercent
        specialFeePercent
        __typename
      }
      state
      version
      penaltyPercent
      perBlockRewards
      totalValueLockedUSD
      minimumFarmingEpochs
      produceRewardsEnabled
      baseApr
      energyFactoryAddress
      boostedYieldsRewardsPercenatage
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  lkmexProxies: proxy {
    address
    wrappedLpToken {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    wrappedFarmToken {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    lockedAssetTokens {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    assetToken {
      balance
      decimals
      name
      identifier
      ticker
      owner
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      price
      type
      __typename
    }
    intermediatedPairs
    intermediatedFarms
    __typename
  }
  simpleLockProxies: simpleLock {
    address
    lockedToken {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    lpProxyToken {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    farmProxyToken {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    intermediatedPairs
    intermediatedFarms
    __typename
  }
  simpleLockEnergy {
    address
    baseAssetToken {
      balance
      decimals
      name
      identifier
      ticker
      owner
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      price
      type
      __typename
    }
    lockedToken {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    legacyLockedToken {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    pauseState
    lockOptions {
      lockEpochs
      penaltyStartPercentage
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  stakingProxies {
    address
    dualYieldToken {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    farmToken {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    lpFarmToken {
      assets {
        website
        description
        status
        pngUrl
        svgUrl
        __typename
      }
      decimals
      name
      collection
      ticker
      __typename
    }
    lpFarmAddress
    pairAddress
    stakingFarmAddress
    __typename
  }
  totalValueLockedUSD
  totalAggregatedRewards(days: $days)
  mexSupply: totalTokenSupply(tokenID: $mexID)
  tokens(identifiers: [$mexID]) {
    balance
    decimals
    name
    identifier
    ticker
    owner
    assets {
      website
      description
      status
      pngUrl
      svgUrl
      __typename
    }
    price
    type
    __typename
  }
}
